languages.text: "Браво, {name}". {n}Ксенос бросает гордый взгляд на Чорду.{/n} "Я знал, что не ошибся в тебе".
"My regards to you, {name}." {n}He glances at Incendia proudly.{/n} "I knew I was right about you."
languages.original_text: "Браво, {name}". {n}Ксенос бросает гордый взгляд на Чорду.{/n} "Я знал, что не ошибся в тебе".

traits.locale_text: "My regards to you, {name}." {n}He glances at Incendia proudly.{/n} "I knew I was right about you."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “向你致意，{name}。”{n}他自豪地看了因森蒂娅一眼。{/n}“我就知道我没看错你。”
languages.original_text: "My regards to you, {name}." {n}He glances at Incendia proudly.{/n} "I knew I was right about you."

traits.locale_text: “向你致意，{name}。”{n}他自豪地看了因森蒂娅一眼。{/n}“我就知道我没看错你。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「よろしくな、{name}」{n}彼は誇らしげにインセンディアを見つめた。{/n}「やっぱり、思った通りの人間だったな」
languages.original_text: "My regards to you, {name}." {n}He glances at Incendia proudly.{/n} "I knew I was right about you."

traits.locale_text: 「よろしくな、{name}」{n}彼は誇らしげにインセンディアを見つめた。{/n}「やっぱり、思った通りの人間だったな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Saludos, {name}». {n}Mira a Incendia con orgullo.{/n} «Sabía que tenía razón sobre usted».
languages.original_text: "My regards to you, {name}." {n}He glances at Incendia proudly.{/n} "I knew I was right about you."

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, {name}». {n}Mira a Incendia con orgullo.{/n} «Sabía que tenía razón sobre usted».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Meine besten Wünsche, {name}." {n}Er blickt Incendia stolz an.{/n} "Ich wusste, ich habe recht mit Euch."
languages.original_text: "My regards to you, {name}." {n}He glances at Incendia proudly.{/n} "I knew I was right about you."

traits.locale_text: "Meine besten Wünsche, {name}." {n}Er blickt Incendia stolz an.{/n} "Ich wusste, ich habe recht mit Euch."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Bravo, {name}, {n}dit-il en lançant un regard fier à Incendia.{/n} Je savais que je ne m'étais pas trompé à votre sujet. »
languages.original_text: "My regards to you, {name}." {n}He glances at Incendia proudly.{/n} "I knew I was right about you."

traits.locale_text: « Bravo, {name}, {n}dit-il en lançant un regard fier à Incendia.{/n} Je savais que je ne m'étais pas trompé à votre sujet. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Saygılarımı sunuyorum {name}." {n}İncendia'ya gururlu bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Senin hakkında yanılmadığımı biliyordum."
languages.original_text: "My regards to you, {name}." {n}He glances at Incendia proudly.{/n} "I knew I was right about you."
